Scottsdale.Arcadia (Phoenix): Arcadia is a neighborhood in Phoenix and Scottsdale, Arizona. It is bounded by 40th Street to 68th Street and Indian School to Camelback Road. Arcadia contains well-kept homes on large lots; these homes command relatively high property values (as the neighborhood is adjacent to the upscale suburbs of Paradise Valley, the Biltmore area, Scottsdale and north Phoenix).
